description: This source file defines a React hook called `useUploadComplianceJob` which provides functionality to validate file uploads, build multipart form data, initiate a job creation request to a backend API, and handle errors. It manages internal state for loading, error, and job information, and exposes a method to start the upload process with proper validation and error normalization.

methods.name: useUploadComplianceJob()
methods.description: A React hook that facilitates uploading compliance job files with validation, error handling, and state management.

methods.name: startJob
methods.description: Initiates the upload process by validating input files, constructing form data, and calling the backend API to create a job, handling success and errors appropriately.

calls: validateUploadPayload({ zip, oldBrand, newBrand, guidelines, intendReplace })
postMultipart("/api/v1/jobs", fd, { retry: { attempts: 2, baseMs: 200, maxMs: 1500 } })
